item.title: TOC TOC
item.description:
Explore the abandoned house next door where no one lives...

It's a lazy Sunday afternoon, and you decide to explore the abandoned house next door. Soon, you find yourself on a tiny quest that takes you through every corner of this strange house. Puzzle your way through three levels with three unique art styles.

Inspired by the Famicase TOC TOC by AQUILES.

https://sweetheartsquad.itch.io/toc-toc https://sweetheartsquad.com/toc-toc

item.title: Turnip the Heat!
item.description:
SALTY, SUCCULENT & SEXY

The root of a good party is a good host: keep the tub toasty and clean, get the drinks and d'ourves flowing, and satisfy your steamy guests in this rootin tootin party panic! Just keep an eye on your InstaYam or your bustling buds buzz'll be busted...

Made for Global Game Jam 2023 with PixiJS. All assets created in JS Paint.

https://sweetheartsquad.itch.io/turnip-the-heat https://sweetheartsquad.com/turnip-the-heat

item.title: STRUNG OUT in heaven's high
item.description:
hitting an all-time low
Do you remember a cat that's been in such an early game? We know that the cat was sent to space. Connected, monitorized, trapped in a tin can. A cat sent to die for the sake of science. High on catnip his brain envisioned adventures of space discovery, intergalactic battles, heroes and glory. But this is the final chapter of the Star Cats saga and the addiction to catnip is now out of control. Strung-out on heaven's high - hitting an all-time low - the little green wheels are following him. https://sweetheartsquad.itch.io/strung-out-in-heavens-high https://sweetheartsquad.com/strung-out-in-heavens-high
